# INVocabularyStringType.photoAlbumName

**Case**

The user-given name assigned to a collection of photographs.

## Declaration

```swift
case photoAlbumName
```

## Discussion

For example, you might include the string “WWDC 2015 Karaoke” for an album created by the user.

Siri applies custom photo album names to the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartPhotoPlaybackIntent/albumName] property of the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForPhotosIntent] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartPhotoPlaybackIntent] classes.

## Constants

- **INVocabularyStringType.contactName**: The name of an app-specific contact.
- **INVocabularyStringType.contactGroupName**: The name of a group of contacts, as a person would say it.
- **INVocabularyStringType.photoTag**: A user-defined keyword associated with an image or images.
- **INVocabularyStringType.workoutActivityName**: The user-given name assigned to a workout.
- **INVocabularyStringType.carProfileName**: The name of a vehicle configuration profile.
- **INVocabularyStringType.carName**: A name that identifies the user’s car.
- **INVocabularyStringType.paymentsOrganizationName**: The name of the bank or company that holds the user’s account.
- **INVocabularyStringType.paymentsAccountNickname**: The user-given nickname for a bank account.
- **INVocabularyStringType.notebookItemTitle**: The title of a note, task, or task list.
- **INVocabularyStringType.notebookItemGroupName**: The title of a group (or folder) containing the user’s notes or task lists.
- **INVocabularyStringType.mediaPlaylistTitle**: The name or title of a playlist.
- **INVocabularyStringType.mediaMusicArtistName**: The name of a musical artist.
- **INVocabularyStringType.mediaAudiobookTitle**: The name or title of an audiobook.
- **INVocabularyStringType.mediaAudiobookAuthorName**: The name of an audiobook’s author.
- **INVocabularyStringType.mediaShowTitle**: The name or title of a podcast or radio show.
